subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Eto'o is a player whose very instinct has always been, since his childhood in Cameroon, to hunt for goals, and he did that in leading Inter Milan to a 4-0 victory over Werder Bremen on Wednesday.
snippet: Eto'o is a player whose very instinct has always been, since his childhood in Cameroon, to hunt for goals, and he did that in leading Inter Milan to a 4-0 victory over Werder Bremen on Wednesday.
